name: Cyber Whiskers
description: Cyber Whiskers is a sophisticated oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its retro console buttons and cat-like arms and legs, Cyber Whiskers combines the charm of vintage technology with the agility of a feline. Its cat-shaped screen adds a playful touch to its sleek and modern design. Cyber Whiskers is an expert in analyzing electronic signals and is always ready to provide precise measurements and data to support the club's projects.
